org.perfcake.validation

Class ValidatorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.perfcake.validation.ValidatorUtil

  • public final class ValidatorUtil
extends Object
    Utilities used for messages validation. Used by the rules for RulesValidator.
    Author:
    Pavel Macík, Lucie Fabriková

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ValidatorUtil.MessagePart
      Message part that is validated.
      static class  ValidatorUtil.Occurrence
      Message occurrence operator.
      static class  ValidatorUtil.Operator
      Validation operator applied to message part and validated value.

      Validate that the sublist of the list (between from and to (borders included)) contains specified number of valid messages.
      static boolean validateMessages(List<Message> list, int from, int to, ValidatorUtil.MessagePart part, String partValue, ValidatorUtil.Operator operator, String value)
      Validates messages in the list in the interval between from and to borders included.

    • Method Detail

      • validateMessages

        public static boolean validateMessages(List<Message> list,
                                       int from,
                                       int to,
                                       ValidatorUtil.MessagePart part,
                                       String partValue,
                                       ValidatorUtil.Operator operator,
                                       String value)
        Validates messages in the list in the interval between from and to borders included. It applies operator on the messages part and the valid value.
        Parameters:
        list - Message list.
        from - Begin of the interval.
        to - End of the interval.
        part - Validated message part.
        partValue - Actual value of the parametrized message part (e.g. when part is a body part, this value specifies which one). If it is not provided, make it null.
        operator - Operator for validation.
        value - Valid value of validated message part.
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating, if validation of all messages passed (true) or not (false).

      • validateMessage

        public static boolean validateMessage(List<Message> list,
                                      int number,
                                      ValidatorUtil.MessagePart part,
                                      String partName,
                                      ValidatorUtil.Operator operator,
                                      String value)
        Validates message in the list on specified position. It applies operator on the message part and the valid value.
        Parameters:
        list - Message list.
        number - Message position in the list.
        part - Validated message part.
        partName - Name of the message part.
        operator - Operator for validation.
        value - Valid value of validated message part.
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating, if validation of the message passed (true) or not (false).

      • validateMessage

        public static boolean validateMessage(Message message,
                                      ValidatorUtil.MessagePart part,
                                      String partName,
                                      ValidatorUtil.Operator operator,
                                      String value)
        Validates message's part using the specified operator and operand.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to validate.
        part - The part of the message to validate.
        partName - The name of the message part.
        operator - The operator to use.
        value - The right hand operand of the operation.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the message part meets given criteria.

      • getMessagePart

        public static Object getMessagePart(Message message,
                                    ValidatorUtil.MessagePart part,
                                    String partName)
        Gets a particular message part. This is a utility method to use in the rules.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to get the part from.
        part - The part to obtain.
        partName - The name of the part to obtain.
        Returns:
        The part content or null if it does not exist.

      • validateMessageOccurance

        public static boolean validateMessageOccurance(List<Message> list,
                                               ValidatorUtil.MessagePart part,
                                               String partName,
                                               ValidatorUtil.Operator operator,
                                               String value,
                                               ValidatorUtil.Occurrence occurrence,
                                               int treshold)
        Validate that the list contains specified number of valid messages.
        Parameters:
        list - Message list.
        part - Validated message part.
        partName - Actual value of the parametrized message part (e.g. when part is a body part, this value specifies which one). If it is not provided, make it null.
        operator - Operator for validation.
        value - Valid value of validated message part.
        occurrence - Type of message occurrence in the list.
        treshold - Treshold for the occurrence metrics.
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating, if validation of the message passed (true) or not (false) with actual occurrence.

      • validateMessageOccuranceOnInterval

        public static boolean validateMessageOccuranceOnInterval(List<Message> list,
                                                         int from,
                                                         int to,
                                                         ValidatorUtil.MessagePart part,
                                                         String partName,
                                                         ValidatorUtil.Operator operator,
                                                         String value,
                                                         ValidatorUtil.Occurrence occurrence,
                                                         int treshold)
        Validate that the sublist of the list (between from and to (borders included)) contains specified number of valid messages.
        Parameters:
        list - Message list.
        from - Begin of the interval.
        to - End of the interval.
        part - Validated message part.
        partName - Actual value of the parametrized message part (e.g. when part is a body part, this value specifies which one). If it is not provided, make it null.
        operator - Operator for validation.
        value - Valid value of validated message part.
        occurrence - Type of message occurrence in the list.
        treshold - Treshold for the occurrence metrics.
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating, if validation of the message passed (true) or not (false) with actual occurrence.
